Description:1715, Caribbean. Pirates have become true masters of the sea and land, organizing their own republic lawlessness, greed and cruelty. Among these robbers noticeable young Captain Edward Kenuey. His path allowed him to win the respect of such legends as Blackbeard, but also drew in an ancient war between Assassins and Templars, in a war that could destroy everything created by pirates. Welcome to the Golden Age of Piracy!

Features of release: 
Release is based on Assassin's Creed IV - Black Flag Uplay Digital Deluxe Edition
Removed the multiplayer and voice except Russian and English / no recoded
Game Version 1.02.0.0
Installation time ~ 10 minutes

Language and Subtitles: Russian, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Brazilian (Portuguese), Swedish

Additional content (only works with 3DM UplayEmu):

Instalation:
1. Run Setup.exe
2. Follow the prompts to install the game installer
3. Play
Update History distribution:
06.12.2013:
Integrated patch to version 1.02.0.0. Unlocked new content (Officer's Outfit, Diamond Sails, The Royal Fortune's Figurehead, Gilded Wheel, 3 Treasures Maps). Removed from the release tablet from RLD, since not updated under the patches. Previously downloaded can Pereheshirovat spool and changed files!
